Name: 100 Seconds
About the game: Your goal is simple: survive for 100 seconds. In this bullet hell game, threatening circles and triangles will chase you, shoot at you, and even explode in an effort to end your life. Take control of a small, vulnerable cube with the ability to evade enemies and shoot back at them. Beware, one hit will kill you. Choose the color of your character. The enemy spawn rate depends upon the color you select.
